name: Microsoft Excel
natural_language_description: 这是 Microsoft Excel 节点。主要用于: Consume Microsoft Excel API

oldVersionNotice.displayName: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.
oldVersionNotice.name: oldVersionNotice
oldVersionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: New node version available: get the latest version with added features from the nodes panel.

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: workbook
available_options: Table (值: table) - Represents an Excel table
Workbook (值: workbook) - Workbook is the top level object which contains related workbook objects such as worksheets, tables, ranges, etc
Worksheet (值: worksheet) - An Excel worksheet is a grid of cells. It can contain data, tables, charts, etc.

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: addRow
available_options: Add Row (值: addRow) - Adds rows to the end of the table
Get Columns (值: getColumns) - Retrieve a list of tablecolumns
Get Rows (值: getRows) - Retrieve a list of tablerows
Lookup (值: lookup) - Looks for a specific column value and then returns the matching row

workbook.name: workbook
workbook.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
workbook.natural_language_description: 参数名: Workbook Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: index (值: None) - Specifies the relative position of the new row. If not defined, the addition happens at the end. Any rows below the inserted row are shifted downwards. Zero-indexed

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: fields (值: None) - Fields the response will containt. Multiple can be added separated by ,.

worksheet.name: worksheet
worksheet.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
worksheet.natural_language_description: 参数名: Worksheet Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

range.name: range
range.description: The address or the name of the range. If not specified, the entire worksheet range is returned.
range.natural_language_description: 参数名: Range | 作用: The address or the name of the range. If not specified, the entire worksheet range is returned. | 默认值: A1:C3 | (必填项)

rawData.name: rawData
rawData.description: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header
rawData.natural_language_description: 参数名: RAW Data | 作用: Whether the data should be returned RAW instead of parsed into keys according to their header | 默认值: False

dataProperty.name: dataProperty
dataProperty.description: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data
dataProperty.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Property | 作用: The name of the property into which to write the RAW data | 默认值: data

dataStartRow.name: dataStartRow
dataStartRow.description: Index of the first row which contains the actual data and not the keys. Starts with 0.
dataStartRow.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Start Row | 作用: Index of the first row which contains the actual data and not the keys. Starts with 0. | 默认值: 1

keyRow.name: keyRow
keyRow.description: Index of the row which contains the keys. Starts at 0. The incoming node data is matched to the keys for assignment. The matching is case sensitve.
keyRow.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key Row | 作用: Index of the row which contains the keys. Starts at 0. The incoming node data is matched to the keys for assignment. The matching is case sensitve. | 默认值: 0

table.name: table
table.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
table.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

lookupColumn.name: lookupColumn
lookupColumn.description: The name of the column in which to look for value
lookupColumn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lookup Column | 作用: The name of the column in which to look for value | (必填项)

lookupValue.name: lookupValue
lookupValue.description: The value to look for in column
lookupValue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lookup Value | 作用: The value to look for in column | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: returnAllMatches (值: None) - By default only the first result gets returned. If options gets set all found matches get returned.
